Sample Posts

This blog contains sample posts which help stage pages and blog data. When you don’t need the samples anymore just delete the _posts/core-samples folder.

$ rm -rf _posts/core-samples

Here’s a sample “posts list”.

  • 06 Mar 2012 » My first blog post
  • 05 Mar 2012 » Learn Javascript in 9 months
  • 29 Dec 2011 » Jekyll Introduction

Create object function

This code creates a Javascript object (dah)!

 1 function Route(routes) {
 2 
 3   this.routes = routes || {};
 4 
 5   this.notFound = function (res) {
 6     res.writeHead(404, {
 7       "Content-Type": "text/plain"
 8     });
 9     res.write("404 Not Found\n");
10     res.end();
11   };
12 
13 }

Highlighting test

1 function object(o) {
2   function F() {}
3   F.prototype = o;
4   return new F();
5 }

jekyll --server
